question: Asalamu alaikum mufti saheb.do we have to repeat our namaz,if after praying or while praying we notice a strand of hair hanging out of our scarf?jazakallah
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
If only one strand of hair was out during the entire Salaat time, the Salaat
will be valid. There is no need to repeat the Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
